content: LankaTel billing operates on a monthly cycle. Postpaid bills are generated on the 1st of each month and due by the 15th. Late payment fee of LKR 150 applies after due date. Bills include: Monthly rental, Usage charges (calls, SMS, data), Value-Added Services, Device installments, Taxes (VAT 18%). E-bills sent via email and available on MyLankaTel app. Paper bills available on request (LKR 50/month).

Your LankaTel bill includes: 1) FIXED CHARGES - Monthly rental based on your plan. 2) USAGE CHARGES - Calls, SMS, data beyond package limits. 3) VAS CHARGES - Caller Tunes, insurance, etc. 4) ONE-TIME CHARGES - Installation, SIM fees, device upgrades. 5) DEVICE INSTALLMENTS - If purchased phone on installment. 6) TAXES - VAT (18%), NBT where applicable. 7) CREDITS - Loyalty rewards, promotional discounts. 8) ADJUSTMENTS - Refunds, corrections from previous bills.

LankaTel accepts multiple payment methods: 1) ONLINE - MyLankaTel app (cards, wallets), my.lankatel.lk, online banking. 2) MOBILE WALLET - LankaTel Pay, FriMi, eZ Cash, mCash. 3) BANK BRANCHES - All major banks (BOC, Peoples, Commercial, HNB, Sampath, NDB, NSB, Seylan). 4) AUTO-DEBIT - Set up standing order with your bank or auto-debit from card. 5) SERVICE CENTERS - Cash, card, cheque. 6) RETAIL PARTNERS - Cargills, Keells, Arpico. 7) POST OFFICES - Island-wide. 8) ATM - Selected bank ATMs.

Pay via MyLankaTel app: 1) Open app and log in. 2) Tap 'Pay Bill' on home screen. 3) Bill amount shown with due date. 4) Select payment method (Saved Card, New Card, LankaTel Pay). 5) Enter payment details. 6) Confirm with OTP if required. 7) Receive confirmation SMS and email. Payment reflects within 15 minutes. For partial payments, enter desired amount. Save card for faster future payments (encrypted, secure).

Set up automatic bill payment: 1) BANK STANDING ORDER - Visit your bank branch with LankaTel account number. 2) CREDIT CARD AUTO-DEBIT - In MyLankaTel app: Settings > Payment Settings > Auto Pay > Add Card > Enable. 3) LANKATAEL PAY AUTO-DEBIT - Enable in wallet settings. Benefits: Never miss a payment, avoid late fees, earn loyalty points. You'll receive SMS 3 days before auto-debit. Cancel anytime via app or by calling 1234.

To dispute a bill: 1) Review itemized bill carefully in app or website. 2) Call 1236 (billing support) with specific concern. 3) Or visit any service center with bill printout. 4) Provide bill reference number and disputed items. 5) Support agent will investigate while you're on call or create ticket. 6) Resolution within 48 hours for standard disputes. 7) If valid, credit applied to next bill or refund processed. 8) Escalate to supervisor if unsatisfied with resolution. Keep records of all communications.

Late payment timeline: Day 1-7 after due date: Reminder SMS sent daily. Day 8: Late payment fee of LKR 150 added. Day 15: Warning call from collections team. Day 21: Outgoing calls barred. Day 30: All services barred (incoming calls still work). Day 45: Service terminated, balance sent to collections. Day 90: Account closed, number may be reallocated. Impact on credit: Defaults reported to CRIB (Credit Information Bureau). To restore: Clear outstanding + late fees + reconnection fee (LKR 500).

Recharge amounts and bonuses: LKR 20 - No bonus (minimum), LKR 50 - 10% bonus data, LKR 100 - 20% bonus data, LKR 200 - 25% bonus data, LKR 500 - 30% bonus data + 50 SMS, LKR 1000 - 35% bonus data + 100 SMS + 20 minutes. Recharge validity: Balance valid for 365 days from last recharge. Special: Reload via app/online for extra 5% bonus. Bonus data valid for 7 days.

Postpaid credit limits by plan: Lite - LKR 2,000, Plus - LKR 5,000, Max - LKR 10,000, Unlimited - LKR 20,000. Request credit limit increase: 1) Call 1234 or visit service center. 2) Requirements: 6+ months tenure, good payment history. 3) Increase approved based on usage pattern and credit score. 4) Maximum limit: LKR 50,000 (requires deposit or guarantee). 5) Temporary limit increase available for travel (7-30 days). Credit limit alerts sent at 80%, 90%, 100% usage.

Charges when package limits exceeded: DATA - LKR 15 per 100 MB (charged in 100 MB blocks). VOICE (Any Network) - LKR 2.00 per minute after package minutes. VOICE (LankaTel) - LKR 1.00 per minute after package minutes. SMS - LKR 0.50 per SMS after package. To avoid excess charges: 1) Set usage alerts in app. 2) Activate add-on boosters before exhausting package. 3) Enable data limit in phone settings. 4) Upgrade to higher package if regularly exceeding.

International roaming rates vary by country. Zone A (India, Singapore): Data LKR 15/MB, Calls LKR 20/min, SMS LKR 10. Zone B (UK, UAE, Australia): Data LKR 25/MB, Calls LKR 35/min, SMS LKR 15. Zone C (USA, Europe): Data LKR 35/MB, Calls LKR 50/min, SMS LKR 20. Zone D (Other): Data LKR 50/MB, Calls LKR 75/min, SMS LKR 25. Save with roaming packs: 1GB + 30 mins Zone A = LKR 999. Incoming calls while roaming: Half of outgoing rate. Wi-Fi calling through app: Free (uses data).

Buy smartphones on installment: Eligibility: Postpaid customers with 6+ months tenure and good payment history. Down payment: 20-30% of device price. Tenure: 12 or 24 months. Interest: 0% for select devices on promotion, otherwise 12% flat. Monthly installment added to bill. Early settlement: Pay remaining balance anytime (no penalty). Default: 2 consecutive missed payments = device blocked, balance due immediately. Popular devices: iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, Xiaomi, Huawei available. Apply online or at LankaTel retail outlets.

Taxes on your LankaTel bill: VAT (Value Added Tax) - 18% on all services. Telecom levy - Included in displayed prices. No additional taxes for consumers. For businesses: VAT invoice available for claiming input tax. Corporate accounts receive tax-compliant invoices. Tax registration details on bill footer. For tax queries: finance@lankatel.lk or call 1236. Annual tax statement available on request for corporate accounts.

Access bill history: 1) MyLankaTel app - Bills section shows last 24 months. 2) my.lankatel.lk - Login and download PDF bills. 3) Request printed statement at service center (LKR 100 per copy). Bill information includes: Usage breakdown by day, Called numbers (last 4 digits masked for privacy), Data consumption by app category, VAS charges itemized. For older bills (>24 months): Email request to billing@lankatel.lk with account details. Bills retained for 7 years as per regulations.

LankaTel refund policy: Eligible refunds: Billing errors (overcharging), Duplicate payments, Service not delivered, Cancelled services within cooling period. Refund process: 1) Report issue to 1236 or service center. 2) Investigation completed within 48 hours. 3) If approved, refund processed within 5 business days. Refund methods: Credit to next bill (default), Bank transfer (for closed accounts), LankaTel Pay wallet, Original payment method for card payments. No refund for: Used services, Activated packages, Promotional credits.

LankaTel Corporate Billing features: Consolidated billing for multiple lines. Department-wise cost allocation. Custom billing date to match financial year. Volume discounts for large accounts. Dedicated billing contact. API integration for ERP systems. Bill formats: PDF, CSV, XML. Payment terms: Net 30 days (negotiable for large accounts). Credit facility up to LKR 1 million. Account management portal for usage monitoring. Contact: corporate.billing@lankatel.lk or call 1237.

availability: 24/7 for online, Branch hours 9 AM - 3 PM
24/7 for online, Branch hours 9 AM - 3 PM
24/7 for online, Branch hours 9 AM - 3 PM
Post office hours (8:30 AM - 4:30 PM weekdays)

app: FriMi app on Play Store/App Store

content: Payment confirmation process: After successful payment, receive instant SMS confirmation with transaction reference number. Email receipt sent to registered email within 5 minutes. Digital receipt available in MyLankaTel app under Payment History. Receipt includes: Transaction date and time, Payment amount, Payment method, Transaction reference number, Bill period covered, Remaining balance (if any). For bank transfers: Confirmation may take 1-2 business days, check with bank for transfer status. For service center payments: Physical receipt provided immediately. Download receipts: Available in PDF format from app or website, can be printed or saved, receipts retained for 24 months online. For expense claims: Detailed receipts with VAT breakdown available, export receipts for accounting purposes, corporate accounts receive consolidated receipts.

Make partial payments on your bill: Available for postpaid accounts with outstanding balance. Minimum partial payment: LKR 500. Process: 1) Open MyLankaTel app > Pay Bill. 2) Enter desired payment amount (must be minimum LKR 500). 3) Complete payment. 4) Remaining balance continues to accrue interest/late fees. Benefits: Maintain some service while paying gradually, avoid complete service suspension, manage cash flow. Important: Full payment still required by final due date, late fees apply to remaining balance, service restrictions may still apply if balance exceeds credit limit. Partial payment history: Track all partial payments in app, see remaining balance clearly, payment schedule visible. Corporate accounts: Bulk partial payments available, payment plans negotiable for large accounts.

Customize your billing cycle: Available for postpaid accounts, standard cycle is 1st to end of month. Options: Mid-month cycle (15th to 14th), End-month cycle (last day to last day), Custom date (subject to approval). Benefits: Align with salary dates, match business financial cycles, better cash flow management. Process: 1) Request via 1234 or service center. 2) Provide reason for change. 3) Approval within 24-48 hours. 4) New cycle starts from next billing period. Important: First bill may be pro-rated, billing date change affects due dates, cannot change more than once per year. Corporate accounts: Flexible billing cycles, multiple cycles for different departments, consolidated billing options. Billing date: Due date automatically calculated (15 days after bill generation), SMS reminders sent 3 days before due date.

What happens when payment fails: Payment failure reasons: Insufficient funds, Card declined, Network issues, Invalid card details, Expired card. Immediate actions: SMS notification sent within 5 minutes, email notification to registered address, payment retry option in app. Retry payment: Can retry immediately in app, update payment method if needed, contact bank if card issue. Consequences: Late fees apply if payment not completed by due date, service restrictions after grace period, credit impact if payment overdue. Prevention: Ensure sufficient balance before payment, keep payment methods updated, enable payment alerts, use auto-pay for reliability. Payment support: Contact 1234 for payment assistance, billing team can help troubleshoot, alternative payment methods available. Failed payment fee: LKR 500 charged for failed auto-pay attempts, waived for manual payment retries, no fee for first-time failures.

Prepaid balance validity and expiry: Balance validity: 365 days from last recharge or usage, balance extends with any recharge or usage activity, expiry date shown in app. Expiry warnings: SMS alert 30 days before expiry, reminder at 7 days, final warning at 1 day. Before expiry: Make any recharge (minimum LKR 20), use any service (call, SMS, data), balance extends for another 365 days. After expiry: Balance forfeited, cannot be recovered, account becomes inactive, number may be released after 90 days. Bonus data expiry: Bonus data valid for 7 days only, separate from main balance, use bonus data first before main balance. Balance protection: Set up auto-recharge to prevent expiry, enable low balance alerts, regular usage keeps balance active. Corporate prepaid: Extended validity for bulk accounts, balance protection features, automated recharge options.

Estimate your upcoming bill: Bill estimation tool in MyLankaTel app shows projected bill based on current usage. Factors considered: Current usage patterns, active packages, recurring charges, estimated excess usage. Access: MyLankaTel app > Billing > Bill Estimate. Features: Real-time estimation updates, daily usage tracking, projected month-end bill, comparison with previous bills. Usage forecasting: Predict data usage based on current trends, estimate voice minutes needed, forecast SMS usage, identify potential overages. Cost optimization: Recommendations for package upgrades/downgrades, identify cost-saving opportunities, compare plan options. Bill alerts: Set bill amount alerts, receive notifications when approaching budget, early warning for high bills. Corporate forecasting: Department-wise bill estimates, budget planning tools, usage trend analysis, cost projection reports.

Secure payment practices: Payment security features: SSL encryption for all transactions, PCI DSS compliant payment gateway, two-factor authentication for high-value payments, secure card storage (tokenized). Safe payment tips: Never share payment details via phone/email, LankaTel never asks for full card number, verify payment URLs (check for https), use official app or website only. Fraud prevention: Monitor payment history regularly, set up payment alerts, report suspicious transactions immediately, use strong passwords for payment accounts. Secure payment methods: LankaTel Pay (most secure), saved cards (tokenized), one-time card entry, bank transfers (most secure for large amounts). Payment verification: OTP required for card payments, SMS confirmation for all payments, email receipts for records, transaction logs in app. If fraud suspected: Contact 1234 immediately, freeze account if needed, report to bank, file police report if significant amount. Payment protection: Dispute unauthorized charges within 60 days, fraud investigation process, compensation for verified fraud.

Request billing adjustments: Adjustment types: Billing errors (overcharging), Service not provided, Duplicate charges, Promotional credits not applied, Package activation errors. Process: 1) Review bill carefully. 2) Identify incorrect charges. 3) Contact 1236 billing support or visit service center. 4) Provide bill reference and details. 5) Investigation within 48 hours. 6) Adjustment applied if valid. Adjustment methods: Credit to next bill (most common), Direct refund to payment method, Account credit balance, Adjustment on current bill. Adjustment timeline: Standard adjustments 48 hours, complex cases 5-7 business days, urgent adjustments expedited. Documentation: Keep bill copies, save SMS confirmations, note adjustment reference numbers, maintain communication records. Adjustment history: View all adjustments in app, track adjustment status, see adjustment details, download adjustment statements. Corporate adjustments: Bulk adjustment processing, department-wise adjustments, consolidated adjustment reports, enterprise adjustment support.

Prepaid package options and pricing: Data packages: 1GB - LKR 99 (validity 7 days), 5GB - LKR 399 (validity 30 days), 10GB - LKR 699 (validity 30 days), 20GB - LKR 1,299 (validity 30 days), 50GB - LKR 2,999 (validity 30 days), Unlimited - LKR 4,999 (validity 30 days). Voice packages: 100 minutes - LKR 199 (30 days), 300 minutes - LKR 499 (30 days), 500 minutes - LKR 799 (30 days), Unlimited - LKR 1,499 (30 days). Combo packages: 5GB + 100 minutes - LKR 599 (30 days), 10GB + 300 minutes - LKR 999 (30 days), 20GB + 500 minutes - LKR 1,799 (30 days). Special packages: Night data (11 PM-6 AM) - 50GB for LKR 499, Weekend data (Sat-Sun) - 20GB for LKR 299, Social media pack (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram) - 10GB for LKR 199. Activation: Via app, USSD *#123#, call 1234, service center. Auto-renewal: Available for all packages, can enable/disable anytime, renews automatically when balance sufficient.

Postpaid plan options and monthly charges: Lite Plan: LKR 999/month - 5GB data, 100 minutes, 100 SMS, credit limit LKR 2,000. Plus Plan: LKR 1,999/month - 15GB data, 500 minutes, 500 SMS, credit limit LKR 5,000. Max Plan: LKR 3,499/month - 50GB data, 1000 minutes, unlimited SMS, credit limit LKR 10,000. Unlimited Plan: LKR 5,999/month - Unlimited data (FUP applies), unlimited minutes, unlimited SMS, credit limit LKR 20,000. Business Plan: LKR 7,999/month - 100GB data, unlimited minutes, unlimited SMS, credit limit LKR 50,000, dedicated support. Family Plan: LKR 4,999/month - 100GB shared data, 5 lines included, additional lines LKR 500 each. Plan features: Rollover data (up to 50% of package), free roaming activation, device financing eligibility, priority support. Plan changes: Upgrade anytime (immediate), downgrade with 30-day notice, pro-rated charges for mid-cycle changes.

Payment reminder system: Reminder schedule: First reminder 7 days before due date, second reminder 3 days before, final reminder on due date, overdue reminders daily until paid. Reminder channels: SMS text messages, email notifications, app push notifications, phone calls for high-value bills. Reminder content: Bill amount, due date, payment methods, late fee information, payment links. Customize reminders: Enable/disable specific reminder types, set quiet hours for reminders, choose preferred channels, set reminder frequency. Payment alerts: Low balance alerts for prepaid, credit limit alerts for postpaid, payment confirmation alerts, failed payment alerts. Notification preferences: Manage in MyLankaTel app > Settings > Notifications, can opt-out of promotional reminders (mandatory reminders cannot be disabled). Corporate reminders: Bulk reminder management, department-wise reminders, consolidated reminder options, business reminder preferences.

VAS billing and charges: VAS categories: Caller tunes (LKR 50/month), Device insurance (LKR 350-950/month), Voicemail (LKR 100/month), Call waiting (LKR 50/month), Call forwarding (LKR 50/month), Conference calling (LKR 100/month), International roaming packs (varies by destination). Billing: VAS charges added to monthly bill, shown separately on bill, can be activated/deactivated anytime, charges pro-rated for mid-cycle changes. VAS management: View active VAS in app, cancel VAS services, modify VAS settings, track VAS usage. VAS credits: Promotional VAS free trials, VAS bundle discounts, loyalty VAS rewards, corporate VAS packages. VAS disputes: Dispute unauthorized VAS activation, request VAS refunds, report VAS billing errors, VAS cancellation credits. Corporate VAS: Bulk VAS activation, enterprise VAS packages, department-wise VAS allocation, VAS usage reporting.

Pay bills from overseas: Accepted methods: International credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard), Bank wire transfer, Online banking from foreign banks, International money transfer services (Western Union, MoneyGram), LankaTel Pay wallet (if already loaded). Process: 1) Use MyLankaTel app or website. 2) Select international payment option. 3) Enter card details or bank information. 4) Complete payment (may require additional verification). Currency: Payments accepted in LKR only, foreign currency converted at current exchange rate, conversion fees may apply. Processing time: International cards - instant, bank transfers - 3-5 business days, money transfer services - 1-2 business days. Fees: International card processing fee 2.5%, bank transfer fees vary by bank, money transfer service fees apply. Support: Contact 1234 for international payment assistance, email billing@lankatel.lk for wire transfer details, dedicated support for overseas customers.

Formal dispute resolution: Step 1 - Initial contact: Call 1236 billing support, explain dispute clearly, provide bill reference number, receive ticket number for tracking. Step 2 - Investigation: Billing team reviews dispute within 48 hours, may request additional information, investigates usage records and charges. Step 3 - Resolution: If valid - credit/refund processed, adjustment appears on next bill, SMS confirmation sent. If invalid - detailed explanation provided with usage logs, payment remains due. Step 4 - Escalation: If unsatisfied, request supervisor review, escalation to billing manager, final internal review within 7 days. Step 5 - External: Contact Telecommunications Regulatory Commission (TRC) if internal resolution fails, TRC acts as mediator, binding resolution. Documentation: Keep all bills, save SMS confirmations, maintain email correspondence, note ticket numbers. Timeline: Standard disputes 48 hours, complex cases 5-7 days, escalated disputes 10-14 days. Corporate disputes: Dedicated dispute resolution, faster processing, business-specific procedures.

Ways to top up prepaid balance: Online methods: MyLankaTel app (cards, wallets), my.lankatel.lk website, online banking, mobile banking apps. Offline methods: Service centers (cash, card), authorized agents, retail stores (Cargills, Keells), post offices, bank branches. USSD method: Dial *#123# from LankaTel number, follow menu prompts, enter amount, confirm with PIN. Mobile wallets: LankaTel Pay, FriMi, eZ Cash, mCash - instant top-up. Scratch cards: Purchase from retail outlets, scratch to reveal PIN, dial *#123*PIN# to recharge. Minimum top-up: LKR 20, maximum per transaction: LKR 10,000. Top-up bonuses: Extra 5% for app/online top-ups, bonus data on select amounts, loyalty points on top-ups. Auto top-up: Set up automatic top-up when balance low, choose top-up amount, enable in app settings. Top-up history: View all top-ups in app, download top-up receipts, track top-up patterns.

Family plan billing structure: Primary account holder: Receives single consolidated bill, responsible for all charges, manages all family members, receives usage summary. Family members: Individual usage tracked, can view own usage, cannot make account changes, usage included in family bill. Bill components: Base family plan charge, shared data pool charges, individual member charges (if applicable), device installments, taxes. Billing cycle: Same for all members, single due date, consolidated payment, one payment covers all. Usage allocation: Shared data pool usage, individual usage tracking, usage alerts to primary holder, member-specific usage reports. Payment: Primary holder pays full bill, members cannot pay separately, payment methods same as individual accounts. Plan management: Add/remove members (affects next bill), change data allocation, modify plan features, all changes reflected in next bill. Corporate family plans: Business family plans available, bulk family plan management, enterprise family billing.

Payment processing timelines: Instant payments: LankaTel Pay wallet, mobile wallets (FriMi, eZ Cash, mCash), credit/debit cards via app, online banking (selected banks). Near-instant: Debit cards (15-30 minutes), online banking transfers (30 minutes - 2 hours), service center card payments (immediate). Standard processing: Bank branch payments (1-2 business days), standing orders (1-2 business days), cheque payments (3-5 business days), post office payments (1-2 business days). International payments: International cards (instant to 24 hours), wire transfers (3-5 business days), money transfer services (1-2 business days). Factors affecting processing: Payment method, bank processing times, weekends and holidays, payment amount, verification requirements. Payment confirmation: SMS within 5 minutes of processing, email receipt within 15 minutes, app update within 30 minutes. Delayed payments: Contact 1234 if payment not reflected after expected time, provide payment proof, investigation within 24 hours.

Roaming billing and charges: Billing method: Postpaid - added to next monthly bill, Prepaid - deducted from balance in real-time. Charge structure: Pay-as-you-go rates (varies by country), roaming data packs (prepaid), roaming call packs (prepaid), daily roaming packages. Roaming pack options: Zone A pack (India, Singapore) - 1GB + 30 mins for LKR 999, Zone B pack (UK, UAE) - 500MB + 20 mins for LKR 1,499, Global pack - 2GB + 60 mins for LKR 2,999. Usage alerts: SMS at 50% of pack, SMS at 80% of pack, SMS at 100% of pack, automatic top-up option. Billing disputes: Dispute roaming charges within 30 days, provide travel dates and destinations, investigation based on usage logs. Cost optimization: Use Wi-Fi when available, activate roaming packs before travel, disable data roaming when not needed, use Wi-Fi calling. Corporate roaming: Business roaming packages, volume discounts, consolidated roaming billing, enterprise roaming support.

Available bill statement formats: PDF format: Standard bill format, printable, includes all details, suitable for records and expense claims. Excel format: Spreadsheet format, editable, suitable for analysis, includes usage data. CSV format: Comma-separated values, importable to accounting software, data analysis friendly. XML format: Machine-readable format, for system integration, API compatible. HTML format: Web-viewable format, interactive charts, online viewing. Statement contents: Account information, billing period, itemized charges, usage breakdown, payment information, tax details. Custom formats: Corporate accounts can request custom formats, department-wise statements, cost center allocation formats. Download options: Download from app, download from website, email statement, request printed copy (LKR 100). Statement retention: 24 months available online, 7 years archived (on request), statements downloadable anytime. Corporate statements: Consolidated statements, multi-format options, ERP integration formats, custom reporting.

Payment plan arrangements: Eligibility: Accounts with financial difficulties, good payment history previously, genuine hardship demonstrated. Plan types: Extended payment plan (2-3 months), Partial payment agreement, Temporary payment deferral, Reduced payment plan. Process: 1) Contact 1234 before account suspension. 2) Explain financial situation. 3) Provide supporting documents. 4) Payment plan approved within 48 hours. 5) Agreed payment schedule documented. Terms: Minimum monthly payment required, service continues during plan, late fees may be waived, must maintain agreed payments. Default consequences: If plan terms not met, account suspended immediately, reconnection fee applies, plan cancelled. Plan management: View plan details in app, track payment schedule, modify plan if needed, contact support for changes. Corporate payment plans: Business payment arrangements, negotiated terms for large accounts, corporate payment schedules, enterprise payment support.

Device installment billing: Installment structure: Monthly installment added to bill, down payment paid upfront, interest charges (if applicable), device cost spread over tenure. Billing details: Installment amount shown separately on bill, device name and model listed, installment number (e.g., 3/24), remaining installments shown. Payment: Installment paid with regular bill, can pay installment separately, early settlement option available, no penalty for early payment. Default handling: 2 consecutive missed payments = device blocked, remaining balance due immediately, device may be repossessed, account impact. Installment management: View installment details in app, track payment progress, see remaining balance, calculate early settlement amount. Promotional offers: 0% interest on select devices, reduced down payment offers, extended tenure options, device bundle deals. Corporate device financing: Bulk device purchases, enterprise device plans, business device financing, corporate device management.

Transfer prepaid balance to another number: Feature availability: Available for prepaid to prepaid transfers, both numbers must be LankaTel, minimum transfer amount LKR 50, maximum LKR 5,000 per transaction. Process: 1) Dial *#132*recipient_number*amount# from your number. Example: *#132*0771234567*500# to transfer LKR 500. 2) Confirm transfer with PIN. 3) Recipient receives SMS notification. 4) Balance transferred instantly. Transfer fees: LKR 10 per transfer (deducted from transferred amount), recipient receives net amount. Transfer limits: Maximum 5 transfers per day, maximum LKR 5,000 per day total, minimum LKR 50 per transfer. Transfer restrictions: Cannot transfer to postpaid accounts, both accounts must be active, sufficient balance required, transfer subject to verification. Use cases: Help family members, emergency balance sharing, gift balance to friends, temporary balance assistance. Transfer history: View all transfers in app, track sent and received transfers, download transfer receipts.

Corporate billing features: Consolidated billing: Single bill for all company lines, department-wise breakdown, employee-level details, cost center allocation. Billing cycles: Custom billing dates, multiple cycles for different departments, alignment with financial year, flexible due dates. Payment terms: Net 30 days standard, negotiable for large accounts, credit facilities up to LKR 1 million, extended terms available. Bill formats: PDF, Excel, CSV, XML formats, custom formats available, ERP integration formats, accounting system compatible. Volume discounts: Automatic discounts for large accounts, tiered pricing, bulk service discounts, enterprise rates. Dedicated support: Corporate billing team, dedicated account manager, priority billing support, custom billing solutions. Reporting: Usage reports by department, employee usage analysis, cost allocation reports, budget vs actual reports. Tax compliance: VAT invoices, tax certificates, withholding tax documentation, compliance reporting. Payment methods: Bank transfers, corporate cards, credit facilities, automated payments.

Payment gateway details: Gateway provider: Secure payment processing, PCI DSS compliant, encrypted transactions, fraud protection. Supported cards: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, local debit cards, international cards. Security features: SSL encryption, tokenized card storage, 3D Secure authentication, fraud monitoring. Payment processing: Real-time processing, instant confirmation, automatic retry for failed payments, secure transaction logging. Gateway fees: No additional fees for customers, standard card processing, transparent pricing, no hidden charges. Payment limits: Minimum LKR 100, maximum varies by payment method, daily limits apply, corporate accounts have higher limits. Supported currencies: LKR (primary), international cards converted automatically, exchange rates applied, conversion fees may apply. Gateway availability: 24/7 availability, 99.9% uptime, maintenance notifications, backup systems. Payment support: Gateway support via 1234, payment troubleshooting, technical assistance, payment issue resolution. Gateway updates: Regular security updates, new features added, compatibility improvements, performance enhancements.

How promotional credits appear on bills: Promotional types: New customer bonuses, loyalty rewards, referral bonuses, seasonal offers, special promotions. Bill display: Promotional credits shown as separate line item, credit amount clearly indicated, promotion name listed, validity period shown. Credit application: Credits applied automatically, reduce bill amount, appear before tax calculation, unused credits may expire. Promotional billing: Free trial periods (no charge), discounted rates (reduced charges), bonus data (separate from package), cashback offers (credit to account). Promotional terms: Validity periods apply, usage restrictions may exist, promotional credits non-transferable, terms and conditions apply. Tracking promotions: View active promotions in app, track promotional credits, see promotion expiry dates, monitor promotional usage. Corporate promotions: Business-specific promotions, volume-based discounts, enterprise promotional packages, corporate reward programs.

Billing during account suspension: Suspension types: Voluntary suspension (customer requested), Non-payment suspension, Security suspension, Temporary suspension. Billing during suspension: Monthly rental continues (unless waived), no usage charges, suspension fee may apply (LKR 200/month), service charges paused. Bill generation: Bills still generated monthly, shows suspension status, includes suspension fees, usage charges zero. Payment requirements: Outstanding balance must be paid, suspension fees due, payment required for reactivation, full payment clears suspension. Reactivation billing: Reconnection fee (LKR 500) added, service charges resume, normal billing cycle continues, first bill may include back charges. Suspension management: View suspension status in app, see suspension fees, track suspension period, manage reactivation. Corporate suspension: Business account suspension, bulk suspension handling, corporate suspension policies, enterprise suspension support.

Receipt requirements for different purposes: Expense claims: Detailed receipt with VAT breakdown, itemized charges, business name and address, tax registration number. Tax purposes: VAT invoice for businesses, tax-compliant receipts, annual tax statements, withholding tax certificates. Accounting: Detailed statements, exportable formats, GL code compatible, accounting software integration. Legal purposes: Official receipts, notarized statements (if required), court-admissible formats, certified copies. Personal records: Standard receipts, digital receipts, printed copies, archived statements. Receipt formats: PDF (most common), Excel (for analysis), printed (physical copy), email (digital copy). Receipt contents: Transaction details, payment amount, payment method, date and time, reference number, account information. Receipt requests: Download from app, request via email, service center printout, postal delivery (charges apply). Corporate receipts: Consolidated receipts, department-wise receipts, tax-compliant formats, custom receipt formats.

Billing for accounts with multiple services: Service types: Mobile service, Fixed line, Broadband, Fiber internet, IoT services, Business services. Billing structure: Consolidated billing for all services, separate line items per service, combined due date, single payment covers all. Service charges: Each service billed separately, service-specific charges, shared charges (if applicable), combined taxes. Bill management: View all services on one bill, service-wise breakdown, combined usage summary, unified payment. Service modifications: Changes affect next bill, pro-rated charges apply, service-specific billing cycles, consolidated due dates. Corporate multi-service: Business service bundles, enterprise service packages, volume discounts across services, unified business billing. Service activation: New services added to existing bill, activation charges included, service charges start from activation date, billing aligned with main account.

Payment verification process: Verification methods: OTP (One-Time Password) for card payments, PIN verification for wallet payments, biometric authentication (fingerprint/Face ID), security questions for high-value payments. OTP process: OTP sent to registered mobile number, valid for 5 minutes, enter OTP to complete payment, OTP required for new cards. PIN verification: 4-digit account PIN, required for certain payments, PIN set during account setup, can be reset at service center. Biometric authentication: Fingerprint or Face ID, faster payment process, secure authentication, available on compatible devices.
